input.sentences: today we are hosting a cookout and pool party at our place .
we started the day by going to the butcher shop for the meat !
then we all went for a swim .
we stocked the fridge with plenty of cold beer .
then it was time to cook up all of the fresh meat .
output.sentences: The friends were getting ready for a pool party being hosted at one of the friends' houses.
The friends started the day shopping for meat.
Afterwards, they went home to swim in the pool.
They made sure they had stocked plenty of beer in the fridge.
When it was time for dinner, one of the friends put some meat on the grill to make some fresh hamburgers.
